name: Jacob NYKAZA and Shirley Nykaza, his wife, and Shirley Nykaza, Administratrix of the Estate of Jacqueline Joan Nykaza, Deceased, v. UNITED STATES FIDELITY AND GUARANTY COMPANY, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Nykaza v. United States Fidelity & Guaranty Co.

parties: Jacob NYKAZA and Shirley Nykaza, his wife, and Shirley Nykaza, Administratrix of the Estate of Jacqueline Joan Nykaza, Deceased, v. UNITED STATES FIDELITY AND GUARANTY COMPANY, Petitioner.

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 139 E.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
516 A.2d 1379
Jacob NYKAZA and Shirley Nykaza, his wife, and Shirley Nykaza, Administratrix of the Estate of Jacqueline Joan Nykaza, Deceased, v. UNITED STATES FIDELITY AND GUARANTY COMPANY, Petitioner.
